channel.title: Full Inventory
channel.description:
From the clientside, what is the code to determine when the inventory is full, or if is?
In words:
if (inventoryIsFull) dropClient;
Something along those lines.
Thanks,
Tanner

item.title: Full Inventory
item.dc:creator: @delicious delicious
item.description:
@delicious wrote:

From the clientside, what is the code to determine when the inventory is full, or if is?

In words:

if (inventoryIsFull)
dropClient;

Something along those lines.

Thanks,

Tanner
